info.title: ServerLess360 Custom Start Activity Custom Connector
info.description: ServerLess360 Custom connector helps you track your business processes.

post.description: This action will start a new business transaction activity.

parameters.name: Body

MessageBody.description: Message body passed to the http trigger

MessageHeader.description: Message header passed to the http trigger

parameters.description: Message body to get properties from the message payload.

parameters.name: SL360-BusinessProcess
parameters.description: Provide business process name.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Business process name that is configured on the portal.

parameters.name: SL360-BusinessTransaction
parameters.description: Provide business transaction name.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Business transaction name that is configured on the portal under the business process.

parameters.name: SL360-CurrentStage
parameters.description: Specify the name for current stage.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Current stage name that is configured on the portal under the business transaction.

parameters.name: SL360-MainActivityId
parameters.description: If this logic app is continuation of existing message flow, provide MainActivityId either from previous logic app or pass the incoming HTTP header which should have MainActivityId.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Use this id on the update activity to update an existing transaction or leave it blank to generate a new activity.

parameters.name: SL360-PreviousStage
parameters.description: If this logic app is continuation of existing message flow, provide previous stage name.
parameters.x-ms-summary: This parameter is mandatory if you are updating an existing transaction.

parameters.name: SL360-ArchiveMessage
parameters.description: Set this flag as true to archive the message for this particular stage.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Archive the message at this particular stage.

parameters.name: SL360-BatchId
parameters.x-ms-summary: Provide a string/guid here to keep track of batched messages.
parameters.description: If this logic app is a batched message provide batch id.

202.x-ms-summary: Returns the MainActivityId and StageActivityId that should be passed to UpdateActivity action.
